item.title: Dire Straits - Walk of Life - Key of F
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Walk Of Life - Dire Straits
Using the chords: Bb C F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum) with some single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Dire Straits - Sultans of Swing
item.description: This is a brief practice video to get the quick changes under your fingers. For the FULL play-along video of "Sultans of Swing," follow this link: https://youtu.be/RLMdIDSpZnU
